General.Name: Prodigy Ventures Inc
General.Description: Prodigy Ventures Inc. provides technology services to enterprises in Canada. The company offers edge platforms, including IDVerifact for digital identity; and tunl for open banking and customer chat support. It also provides technology services for digital identity, open banking, and payments; and digital transformation services, such as strategy, architecture, design, project management, agile development, quality engineering, and staff augmentation. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 80 Richmond Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2A3

2.Name: Mr. George  Colwell
